post.author: 이성기
post.content: detail is Roja version 1.1 Enhancement - Nov 13, 2001, Scott Lee 1. allow direct SQL query - RDB.executeQuery(String sql_statement) 2. allow multiple object add to relational database with RDB.java - Storable.add(String[] ids, String[] objs) 3. HTML FORM multiple input values are accepted as String[] in ControlServlet. You can download from http://www3.sympatico.ca/scottlee/java/framework/roja/roja.war http://www3.sympatico.ca/scottlee/java/framework/roja/readme.html
post.title: Roja 1.1 released
